org.displaytag.render

Class TableTotaler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.displaytag.render.TableTotaler

  • public class TableTotaler
extends Object
    This class just keeps a running grouped total. It does not output anything; it is the responsibility of the exporter or of the decorator to actually output the results.
    Author:
    rapruitt Date: May 21, 2010 Time: 9:17:43 PM
